eftaios.network.socket.server

Class OnlineGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • eftaios.network.socket.server.OnlineGame

  • public class OnlineGame
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OnlineGame(Model model)
      Create an online game holding the given model

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameEvent addClientID(java.net.InetAddress clientID)
      Add a client to this online game and assign him a player in the game and check if this game is ready for being start if there are two or more players this game is labeled as ready
      java.util.List<java.net.InetAddress> getConnectedClients() 
      java.util.Map<java.net.InetAddress,Player> getConnectedPlayers() 
      Model getModel() 
      int getNumberOfConnectedPlayers() 
      Player getPlayer(java.net.InetAddress clientID)
      Get the corresponding player to a client inside this game
      boolean isPlaying() 
      boolean isReady() 
      boolean isStarting() 
      void reAssignClientsToPlayes()
      this method will reassign the connected client to the players of the game so that each client connected as a player inside the game and vice versa before starting the game it is possible that the number of players inside the game is different to the number of clients connected to the game
      void removeClient(java.net.InetAddress client)
      Remove a client from this game

    • Method Detail

      • setModel

        public void setModel(Model model)

      • getModel

        public Model getModel()

      • addClientID

        public GameEvent addClientID(java.net.InetAddress clientID)
        Add a client to this online game and assign him a player in the game and check if this game is ready for being start if there are two or more players this game is labeled as ready
        Parameters:
        clientID - the client identifier of the added client
        Returns:
        An event representing the result of the add

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer(java.net.InetAddress clientID)
        Get the corresponding player to a client inside this game
        Parameters:
        clientID - the client
        Returns:
        the player associated with the given client

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient(java.net.InetAddress client)
        Remove a client from this game
        Parameters:
        client - the client to be removed

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Returns:
        true if the game is ready to start

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Returns:
        true is the game is already being played

      • setPlaying

        public void setPlaying(boolean playing)

      • getConnectedClients

        public java.util.List<java.net.InetAddress> getConnectedClients()

      • reAssignClientsToPlayes

        public void reAssignClientsToPlayes()
        this method will reassign the connected client to the players of the game so that each client connected as a player inside the game and vice versa before starting the game it is possible that the number of players inside the game is different to the number of clients connected to the game

      • setStarting

        public void setStarting(java.lang.Boolean starting)
        Parameters:
        starting - set if this object is being started by an object

      • isStarting

        public boolean isStarting()
        Returns:
        true if this game is already being started by someone only one object can start a game at a time
